mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ms_activity WHERE activity_title LIKE CONCAT('%', COALESCE(#{activityTitle}, ''), '%') AND is_release LIKE CONCAT('%', COALESCE(#{isRelease}, ''), '%') AND activity_introduce LIKE CONCAT('%', COALESCE(#{activityIntroduce}, ''), '%') AND is_link LIKE CONCAT('%', COALESCE(#{isLink}, ''), '%') AND del_flag = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ms_activity(activity_id, activity_title, activity_introduce, activity_content, activity_sign, cover_url, is_release, is_link, link, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) VALUES (#{activityId}, #{activityTitle}, #{activityIntroduce}, #{activityContent}, #{activitySign}, #{coverUrl}, #{isRelease}, #{isLink}, #{link}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{remark})
